title: Convert Eagle Logo to Circular Design with Animation and Remove Email from Header

requirements.summary: Convert eagle logo background from square to perfect circular shape with symmetrical, clean smooth edges centered around the eagle head
acceptanceCriteria: Logo background is a perfect circle with no square corners visible
Circle is fully symmetrical with clean smooth edges
Eagle head is centered perfectly within the circular background
No masking artifacts or distortions visible

file_operations.description: Update the logo container styling to use circular shape with aspect-ratio: 1/1, rounded-full class, and object-fit: cover on the image. Center the eagle image within the circular container using flexbox centering. Remove any square border or masking artifacts by ensuring the container clips content with overflow-hidden and applies border-radius: 50%.

requirements.summary: Style circular logo background with dark base color, neon cyan glow, subtle futuristic gradient or glass effect maintaining SwiftOps premium branding
acceptanceCriteria: Dark circular base is applied
Neon cyan glow is visible and elegant
Gradient or glass effect is subtle and futuristic
Design matches SwiftOps premium branding aesthetic

file_operations.description: Add dark circular base background using bg-black or bg-gray-900. Apply neon cyan glow using box-shadow with cyan color values (e.g., 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.6)). Implement subtle futuristic gradient or glassmorphism effect using background-gradient or backdrop-blur. Ensure styling aligns with existing neon cyan theme defined in tailwind.config.js and index.css.

requirements.summary: Add soft, elegant neon ring glow around circular logo with optional rotating or breathing light ring effect for futuristic feel
acceptanceCriteria: Soft neon ring glow is visible around the circle
Glow intensity is elegant and not overly bright
Rotating or breathing animation is smooth and subtle
Effect enhances the futuristic aesthetic

file_operations.description: Add an outer ring element wrapping the circular logo with ring glow using box-shadow with multiple layers for soft falloff. Implement optional CSS animation for rotating ring (using @keyframes spin) or breathing effect (using @keyframes pulse with opacity/scale changes). Set animation duration to 3-5 seconds with ease-in-out timing. Ensure glow intensity remains elegant by using lower opacity values (0.4-0.6) for cyan color.

Add custom CSS keyframe animations for rotating-ring and breathing-glow effects if not already present. Define animation utilities for the neon ring glow that can be applied to the logo wrapper element. Use the existing neon cyan color variables for consistency.

requirements.summary: Update eagle logo animation to match circular design with 2-4 second sequence: circular energy ring forms, neon outline draws circle, robotic scan passes, eagle activates, eyes/accents power on, final soft pulse stabilization
acceptanceCriteria: Animation sequence lasts 2-4 seconds
Circular energy ring forms first as the opening stage
Neon outline draws the circle smoothly without hard edges
Robotic scan effect passes across the circular area
Eagle logo activates inside the circle with eyes/accents powering on
Animation ends with soft pulse glow stabilization
No square reveal animations or sudden pop effects present

file_operations.description: Refactor the entrance animation to implement a 2-4 second circular-themed sequence. Stage 1 (0-0.5s): Create circular energy ring forming animation using scale transform from 0.8 to 1 with opacity fade-in. Stage 2 (0.5-1.2s): Implement neon circle outline drawing using SVG stroke-dasharray/stroke-dashoffset animation or CSS border animation with gradient. Stage 3 (1.2-2s): Add robotic scan effect using a linear-gradient overlay that translates across the circular area. Stage 4 (2-2.8s): Activate eagle logo with fade-in and subtle scale, add eye/accent glow using box-shadow pulse. Stage 5 (2.8-3.5s): Final soft pulse stabilization using opacity and scale keyframes. Remove any square reveal animations and avoid sudden pop effects by using ease-in-out timing functions throughout.

Add CSS keyframe definitions for circular entrance animation stages: @keyframes circle-energy-form, @keyframes neon-circle-draw, @keyframes robotic-scan, @keyframes eagle-activate, @keyframes eye-glow, and @keyframes pulse-stabilize. Ensure all animations use smooth easing functions and circular-friendly properties (scale, opacity, rotate) rather than square-based transforms.

requirements.summary: Ensure circular logo remains perfectly round on all screen sizes with proportional scaling and no stretching or oval distortion
acceptanceCriteria: Logo circle is perfectly round on desktop screens
Logo circle is perfectly round on tablet screens
Logo circle is perfectly round on mobile screens
Proportional scaling maintains circular shape across all breakpoints
No stretching or oval distortion occurs at any screen size

file_operations.description: Implement responsive sizing using Tailwind responsive classes (w-16 h-16 md:w-20 md:h-20 lg:w-24 lg:h-24) ensuring width equals height at all breakpoints. Use aspect-ratio: 1/1 CSS property as fallback. Apply max-width constraints to prevent excessive growth on large screens. Verify circular shape is maintained by using rounded-full with equal width/height values across all screen sizes.

requirements.summary: Optimize logo animation performance to remain smooth and lightweight with fast loading on mobile and desktop
acceptanceCriteria: Animation runs smoothly at 60fps on desktop
Animation runs smoothly on mobile devices
Logo loads quickly without blocking page render
Animation does not cause performance degradation

file_operations.description: Optimize animation performance by using CSS transform and opacity properties (GPU-accelerated) instead of layout-triggering properties. Apply will-change: transform, opacity to animated elements. Use requestAnimationFrame for any JavaScript-based animation timing. Lazy load or defer non-critical animation stages. Consider using CSS containment (contain: layout style paint) on the logo container. Ensure the eagle image asset frontend/public/assets/generated/robotic-eagle-logo.dim_512x512.png loads efficiently with appropriate compression.

requirements.summary: Remove Gmail address 'zeeshan.automation06@gmail.com' completely from header navigation including email text and icon
acceptanceCriteria: Gmail address text is not visible in header
Email icon is removed from header if present
No trace of the email address remains in the navigation bar

file_operations.description: Locate and remove any JSX elements or components rendering the email address 'zeeshan.automation06@gmail.com' from the navigation bar. Remove any associated email icon elements (Mail, Envelope icons) from the header. Search for email-related className references and clean up unused styles.

requirements.summary: Automatically realign remaining header elements after email removal ensuring no empty spacing or gaps remain with balanced centered layout
acceptanceCriteria: Logo position is properly aligned after email removal
Navigation menu spacing is balanced
Contact buttons are properly positioned
No empty gaps or awkward spacing in header
Header appears professionally balanced

file_operations.description: Adjust flexbox layout and spacing utilities after removing email element. Update gap, space-x, or justify-between classes to redistribute remaining elements (logo, navigation menu, contact buttons) evenly across the header. Ensure logo, nav links, and CTA buttons maintain proper alignment using flex containers. Remove any conditional spacing logic that depended on the email element being present.

requirements.summary: Fix header alignment for desktop, tablet, and mobile views after email removal ensuring navbar remains balanced and centered across all responsive breakpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Header alignment is correct on desktop screens
Header alignment is correct on tablet screens
Header alignment is correct on mobile screens
Navbar maintains balanced appearance at all breakpoints
Elements remain properly centered responsively

file_operations.description: Review and update responsive Tailwind classes for all breakpoints (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:) to ensure proper alignment after email removal. Test and adjust flexbox justify-content and align-items properties for each screen size. Verify mobile hamburger menu layout remains intact. Ensure desktop navigation menu, mobile menu, and contact buttons are properly centered and spaced at all viewport widths.

requirements.summary: Preserve existing neon styling, spacing, professional futuristic appearance, and consistent header height after removing email address
acceptanceCriteria: Neon styling is preserved throughout header
Spacing consistency is maintained
Header retains professional futuristic look
Header height remains the same as before changes
Visual design quality is not degraded

file_operations.description: Preserve all existing neon glow effects, cyan color theming, and glassmorphism styles on remaining header elements. Maintain fixed header height by ensuring h-16 or h-20 class (or equivalent) remains applied to the nav container. Verify padding, text sizing, and icon styling remain consistent with the original design. Do not modify or remove any neon-themed className utilities or style properties that define the futuristic appearance.
